actions.committee: Committee on Appropriations pursuant to Public Law 98-473, provided that if the Committee has not reported the resolution (or an identical resolution) fifteen calendar days after its introduction, such Committee shall be discharged from further consideration of the resolution
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Appropriations pursuant to Public Law 98-473, provided that if the Committee has not reported the resolution (or an identical resolution) fifteen calendar days after its introduction, such Committee shall be discharged from further consideration of the resolution.

actions.in_committee: Committee on Appropriations pursuant to Public Law 98-473, provided that if the Committee has not reported the resolution (or an identical resolution) fifteen calendar days after its introduction, such Committee shall be discharged from further consideration of the resolution
actions.text: Committee on Appropriations. Hearings held. Hearings printed: S.Hrg. 99-65.

actions.in_committee: Committee on Appropriations pursuant to Public Law 98-473, provided that if the Committee has not reported the resolution (or an identical resolution) fifteen calendar days after its introduction, such Committee shall be discharged from further consideration of the resolution
actions.text: Committee on Appropriations. Ordered to be reported without amendment favorably.
Committee on Appropriations. Reported to Senate by Senator Hatfield without amendment. With written report No. 99-33.
Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 83.

Senators Dole, Byrd (for Bentsen), Helms, and Byrd, filed notice in writing of their intentions to move to suspend that portion of the Rules of the Senate contained in P.L. 98-473 for the purpose of proposing amendments to the joint resolution.
Passed Senate without amendment by Yea-Nay Vote. 53-46. Record Vote No: 31.

official_title: A joint resolution to approve the obligation of funds available under Public Law 98-473 for supporting military or paramilitary operations in Nicaragua.

summary.text: States that the Congress approves the obligation and expenditure of funds for FY 1985 to support military or paramilitary operations in Nicaragua.

titles.title: A joint resolution to approve the obligation of funds available under Public Law 98-473 for supporting military or paramilitary operations in Nicaragua.
